title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 2053.5 - Designation and responsibilities of privacy compliance officer
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 2053.5 - Designation and responsibilities of privacy compliance officer

State Regulations
(a) Judith G. Liebman is hereby designated
privacy compliance officer of the corporation and is responsible for ensuring
that the corporation complies with the provisions of the Personal Privacy

Protection Law and this Part and for coordinating the corporation's response to
requests for records or amendment of records. (b) The address and telephone number of the
privacy compliance officer is: United Nations Development Corporation, Two

United Nations Plaza, 27th Fl., New York, NY 10017, (212) 702-5100. (c) The privacy compliance officer shall: (1)
provide any necessary assistance to a
data subject in identifying and requesting personal information; (2)
locate records or systems of records
sought by a data subject and take the actions referred to in sections
2053.8
(c) and
2053.9
(a) of this

Part with respect to such records or systems of records; (3)
upon request, certify that a copy of a
record is a true copy; or
(4)
certify, upon request, that: (i) the
corporation does not have possession of the record sought; (ii)
the corporation cannot locate the record
sought after having made a diligent search; or
(iii)
the information sought cannot be
retrieved by use of the description thereof, or by use of the name or other
identifier of the data subject without extraordinary search methods being
employed by the corporation. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
2053.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
